data.name: Whiteboyz Wit Attitude: The Pursuit of Money (Album)
data.detailed_description:
The greatest rappers of all time* have returned with a 30 track magnum opus! Get ready to experience the most banging hip hop tracks you’ve ever heard with an album that flows together like an epic movie. Experience a heartwarming story of two farmers striving to be the greatest and most richest rappers of all time, and don’t forget to play the interactive music videos from our game!

* WWA was voted the greatest rappers of all time by two people on social media…. yes, they were our mothers.
